sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
The great point of succession discussed with a full and particular answer to a late pamphlet, intituled, A brief history of succession, &c. Brady, Robert, 1627?-1700.
[2], 38 p.
Printed for H. Rodes ..., London : 1681.
Errata: p. 38. Includes bibliographical references. Another pamphlet by Brady, occasioned by Somers' Brief history of the succession, has title: True and exact history of the succession ... written at first for the information of such as are deluded ... by the pamphlet called, A brief history of the succession ... London, 1681. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
=======

[2], 38 p.
Printed for H. Rodes ..., London : 1681.
Errata: p. 38. Includes bibliographical references. Another pamphlet by Brady, occasioned by Somers' Brief history of the succession, has title: True and exact history of the succession ... written at first for the information of such as are deluded ... by the pamphlet called, A brief history of the succession ... London, 1681. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
H. Rodes
